name: Beyond Astra - Alpha Preview

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 - 64 Bits
  • Processor: 4-core Processor (Intel® Core™ i5 5th-generation or AMD® Ryzen™ 2x00 series)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB+ VRAM (NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 or AMD® Radeon™ RX-460)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse with Wheel, Keyboard and Speakers recommanded.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 - 64 Bits
  • Processor: 8-core Processor (Intel® Core™ i7 8th-generation or AMD® Ryzen™ 3x00 series)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6GB+ VRAM (Nvidia® GeForce® 1060 or AMD® Radeon™ 580)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse with Wheel, Keyboard and Speakers recommanded.
